text: we started if you read the literature everybody knew that no till had more runoff than conventional tillage but no till at that time was they take a conventionally tilled field after harvest they'd till some of it leave some of it untilled and sprinkle it with water and gee water went ran off more in the noil see and so we actually included a noil type treatment in some of what we're doing it was kind of a high runoff check but after 3 years it wasn't the high runoff check anymore but then to try to get people to move that way in in the system took a while and then kind of that started to change the mindset
